name: Office Cleaning Services
description: Complete cleaning solutions for offices including workstations, cabins, washrooms, and common areas to maintain a clean, productive, and welcoming workspace.

name: General Pest Control
description: Comphrehensive pest control services to eliminate common household pests like ants, spiders, rodents, lizards and cockroach ensuring a safe and healthy living environment.

name: Commercial Pest Control
description: Get rid of all the pests in your commercial space with our expert pest control solutions.

name: After Interior Cleaning Services
description: Post-renovation cleanup to remove dust, paint stains, and debris, making your newly designed space move-in ready and pristine.

name: Bathroom Cleaning
description: Professional deep cleaning of bathrooms, removing stains, hard water marks, and disinfecting all surfaces including tiles, fittings, and floors for a sparkling and hygienic space.

name: Cockroach Control
description: Targeted treatment to eliminate cockroach infestations from kitchens, bathrooms, and other hiding spots, ensuring a pest-free environment.

name: Mattress Cleaning Services
description: Deep cleaning and sanitization of mattresses to remove dust mites, stains, and odors, enhancing sleep hygiene and freshness.

name: Mosquito Control
description: Effective mosquito control solutions to reduce mosquito breeding and infestation, protecting your home from mosquito-borne diseases.

name: Termite Control

name: Terrace Cleaning
description: Removal of dirt, moss, and stains from terrace surfaces, followed by a thorough wash to make your outdoor space clean and usable.
